text: Gbogbo ẹ̀dá sì máa jáde sọ́dọ̀ Allāhu (lọ́jọ́ Àjíǹde). Nígbà náà, àwọn aláìlágbára yóò wí fún àwọn t’ó ṣègbéraga pé: “Dájúdájú àwa jẹ́ ọmọlẹ́yìn fun yín, ǹjẹ́ ẹ̀yin lè gbé n̄ǹkan kan kúrò fún wa nínú ìyà Allāhu?” Wọn yóò wí pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Allāhu tọ́ wa sọ́nà ni, àwa ìbá tọ yín sọ́nà. Bákan náà sì ni fún wa, yálà a káyà sókè tàbí a ṣàtẹ̀mọ́ra (ìyà); kò sí ibùsásí kan fún wa.”
